channel.title: England Lossed The Rugby Against South Africa!
channel.description: We lost :( England Lost :( the score was 6 - 15 and was a tense game. England had a disallowed try which was obvious to everyone tht i should have been a try. Post your veiws on the game?

item.title: England Lossed The Rugby Against South Africa!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:33, topic:153039”]That try was absolutely valid! Stupid Australlian man who said no, his knee touched outside of the line well after the ball when down. Even the commentators were 100% sure it was in when they saw the angle from behind.

I watched the whole match, it was a great game, laughed my ass off when that guy went flying into the camera. Congratz south africa, we didn’t even expect to get to the final this year so I can’t complain.[/quote]
Nah, it was just out looking at it from another angle (behind ror)

Read full topic

item.title: England Lossed The Rugby Against South Africa!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

That try was absolutely valid! Stupid Australlian man who said no, his knee touched outside of the line well after the ball when down. Even the commentators were 100% sure it was in when they saw the angle from behind.

I watched the whole match, it was a great game, laughed my ass off when that guy went flying into the camera. Congratz south africa, we didn’t even expect to get to the final this year so I can’t complain.

item.title: England Lossed The Rugby Against South Africa!
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“spankjava, post:27, topic:153039”]ye it was a good match

but for people who didnt watch this is the try we did dcore but got disaloud

[/quote]

No, it was the right decision. His foot dragged along the ground to the line and after it had touched the line that was when it left the ground and this was before he placed the ball down for a try, so yeah, it shouldn’t have been allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: England Lossed The Rugby Against South Africa!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“spankjava, post:27, topic:153039”]ye it was a good match

but for people who didnt watch this is the try we did dcore but got disaloud

[/quote]
from that angle of the camera it was hard to see if it was on the line or over it or not.
From the other angle you can clearly see it was over the line.

[quote=“killerman93, post:25, topic:153039”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=209240.msg1836345#msg1836345 date=1192972642]
Before i watched this match i didn’t even know how the game was played.
Well anyways i went to the pub for the first time today (idk why they were letting like everybody in) and was watching it, felt good to be shouting abuse at the screen with a lode of drunk 40 year old no-lifers.

Too bad we lost though. It was obvious that they were going to win though.
[/quote]

Your English and you don’t know how to play rugby?
They teach us at school.[/quote]
I dont play sports at school, i find it a waste of time as i am not doing gcse p.e. (Although i do enjoy playing sports, the sports at my school consists of doing assault corses which are just tiring and not my cup of tea;))
